::Killfest/DarkMouse/Goldeneye::

Killfest enters the bridge behind DrillBit, watching him sit in the 
command chair. DrillBit better not be thinking that he was in charge 
here. Killfest wasn't sure who DarkMouse would side with, but she was 
the only one he knew of that this base listened to, so she could very 
well be the deciding factor in a civil war. Not that Killfest was 
planning one.

"Yes, her death was rather unfortunate," he replies, looking over 
some computer panels. The door opens and DarkMouse walks in with 
Goldeneye following her.

"Ok, I'll need a list of all the bots on our team, boss," DarkMouse 
says, looking from DrillBit to Killfest with a smile on her face.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He makes it too the Bridge.
> "I hoped for this chance for a long time. I just hate that its 
because
> KitKat is gone."
> He sits in the command chair.
